DOC.brief_summary: The investigator perform 12-week , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled human trial evaluate efficacy safety Eriobotyra Japonica Lindley Extract improvement Memory Function . The investigator measure decrement improvement Memory Function , include K-MMSE , Rey-Kim Memory Test , BCRS , PRMQ , monitor blood pressure .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Eriobotyra Japonica Lindley Extract Improvement Cognitive Function
